actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to establish a congressional internship program for secondary school teachers of government or social studies in honor of President Lyndon Baines Johnson.

summary.text: Establishes a congressional intership program for secondary school teachers of government or social studies. Provides that interns in the program shall be certified as bona fide teachers in such studies. Provides that interns in such program shall be known as Lyndon Baines Johnson teacher congressional interns.

titles.title: A bill to establish a congressional internship program for secondary school teachers of government or social studies in honor of President Lyndon Baines Johnson.
